description.displayText: Gloria keeps my Tribeca apartment very clean and I love coming home to a spotless apartment. She manages to do this and the laundry despite having a small dog and four cats. I would recommend her for your apartment or house without reservation.
description.originalText: Gloria keeps my Tribeca apartment very clean and I love coming home to a spotless apartment. She manages to do this and the laundry despite having a small dog and four cats. I would recommend her for your apartment or house without reservation.

description.displayText: Gloria bares many qualities that I find lacking in people of today.  She is a very caring, kind, generous, honest, loving person. I have found her to be reliable and true to any promise she may make to you. If she can not fulfill her promise she will let you know up front. She embraces her children with her entire being and still has space for those she befriends. I myself have teased her many times at how she is extremely neat and clean. Which is how she presents herself as well. Her home must be a certain way and she constantly pampers her home to meet her expectations. I can only imagine her to be the same at any task she does outside her home.

description.displayText: My name is Sara and I own a single family house in Forest Hills.  I am so glad that I found Gloria through Care.com, she is truly a gem.  In a few short months she has proven herself to be a reliable, focused and thorough house cleaner.  Gloria is completely trusted in my home and I highly recommend her services.

description.displayText:
Gloria is a sweet young lady. I can count on Gloria when I need her on a bi-weekly basis.
She leaves my home smelling fresh and organized every time. 
I would recommend Gloria, She cleans with a lot of heart.



Ms. Zorail M.

description.displayText: Gloria does a wonderful job of cleaning my home in Forest Hills. She is reliable and trustworthy and she meticulously keeps everything clean and organized. I highly recommend Gloria's services.
